name: POY
description:
Movement:  [WASD][Mouse]

Lit up the fire:  [E]

An eerie adventure game about a hiker in the mountains. Your goal is to lit up all the firepits and reach the top of this little mountain.

This is my first game on Itch, made in 3 days.
